root.message: The DISAGGREGATION field for indicator 11-1-1, translated into en
root.data:
## Disaggregation [^13] ### Potential disaggregation
* Disaggregation by location (intra-urban) * Disaggregation by income group * Disaggregation by sex, race, ethnicity, religion, migration status (head of household) * Disaggregation by age (household members) * Disaggregation by disability (household members)
### Quantifiable Derivatives:
* Proportion of households with durable housing * Proportion of households with improved water * Proportion of households with improved sanitation * Proportion of households with sufficient living space * Proportion of households with security of tenure * Proportion of households with one (1) housing deprivation * Proportion of households with multiple (3 or more) housing deprivations * Proportion of households with approved municipal permit * Proportion of households with (in) adequate housing (affordability)
